full_summary:
---

**Tender Title**
================

*   **English Title**: Building Condition Reports - Amherst and Dartmouth
*   **French Title**: Rapports sur l'état des bâtiments - Amherst et Dartmouth

**Tender Reference**
================

*   **Reference Number**: WS4647076582
*   **Doc Number**: 4647083933

**Tender Status**
================

*   **Closing Date**: 2024-08-07T14:00:00
*   **Status**: This tender is now expired.

**Tender Description**
=====================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites prequalified firms that specialize in architecture and interior design services under the related Supply Arrangement (E0225-15229) to provide Building Condition Reports for the following buildings:

*   **Amherst Enos Collins Building**: 38-40 Havelock St., Amherst, NS
*   **Marine House Building**: 176 Portland St., Dartmouth, NS

The following six firms are invited to respond to this notice:

*   Arcadis Architects (Canada) Inc.
*   Acre Architects Inc.
*   Turner Fleischer Architects Inc.
*   Fougere Menchenton Architecture Inc.
*   Root architecture Inc.
*   Duffus, Romans, Kundzins & Rousefell Limited

**Tender Requirements**
=====================

To be considered, firms must review the detailed tender notice below:

### Documents

*   Building Condition Reports for Amherst and Dartmouth facilities
*   Automated Performance Guidelines

### Assessment Criteria
-----------------------------

 The tender will be awarded based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. All offers will be assessed according to the specific requirements outlined below.

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

Pursuant to Article 10 (Government Procurement) of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), this tender is open to bidders from Canada and Korea.

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Point of Contact**
================

The point of contact for any questions or concerns regarding this tender is:

*   Richard Parsons
